entry.title: it manage redmine
entry.content:
redmine

1. Redmine application & Database

MySQL

PostgreSQL

2. Create an empty database and accompanying user

MySQL

PostgreSQL

3. Database connection configuration

MySQL

localhost -> 127.0.0.1

postgresql

4. Dependencies installation
5. Session store secret generation
6. Database schema objects creation
7. Database default data set
8. File system permissions

The user account running the application must have write permission on the following subdirectories:

  • files (storage of attachments)
  • log (application log file production.log)
  • tmp and tmp/pdf (create these ones if not present, used to generate PDF documents among other things)
  • public/plugin_assets (assets of plugins)

E.g., assuming you run the application with a redmine user account:

9. Test the installation

-b 0.0.0.0

10. Startup

网络安全 - SSL 和 TLS
网络安全 - WS-Security
entry.content:
Web Services Security (WS-Security, WSS) is an extension to SOAP to apply security to Web services. It is a member of the Web service specifications and was published by OASIS.

The protocol specifies how integrity and confidentiality can be enforced on messages and allows the communication of various security token formats, such as Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML), Kerberos, and X.509. Its main focus is the use of XML Signature and XML Encryption to provide end-to-end security.
entry.summary: Web Services Security (WS-Security, WSS) is an extension to SOAP to apply security to Web services. It is a member of the We

entry.title: Visual Studio 编译 Darwin Streaming Server
entry.content:
1 Patch

2 Fix compile error

1) OSHeaders.h
  • 解决socket相关函数重复定问题;
  • 解决time相关函数编译失败的问题.
2) 宏定义

搜索解决方案, 在_S32BITARG_ / _U32BITARG_ / _64BITARG_ / _S64BITARG_ / _U64BITARG_前后加空格.

在VS2015下宏定义必须前后带空格符, 否则会被识别成字符串导致编译失败.

3) arpa/inet.h

搜索解决方案, 对#include 进行修改, 在Windows上平台上没有此头文件.

4) QTAccessFile.cpp

注释掉以下头文件的引用, 同时, 注释掉一个未被引用的函数.

5) QTSSPasswd.cpp

打开此注释

6) RTPStream.cpp

3 Fix Link error

链接错误是因为找不到对应的实现, 给链接不通过的工程添加实现即可, 不再赘述.

  • StreamingLoadTool (需添加1个cpp文件到工程)
  • StreamingServer (需添加N个cpp文件到工程)
entry.summary: 1 Patch

entry.title: Visual Studio 编译 live555
p2p 概览
RTSP/RTP/RTCP 概览
entry.content:
• RTSP to control presentation sessions with commands such as PLAY and PAUSE.
  • RTP to deliver actual stream data to clients, regardless of the client type or media encoding
  • RTCP to communicate and monitor individual stream information between clients and servers
  • SDP to give clients information about a requested piece of media
entry.summary:
• RTSP to control presentation sessions with commands such as PLAY and PAUSE.
  • RTP to deliver actual stream data
